6. Which Brewery has the highest rated beers?
```{r}
beers %>% 
  group_by(Brewery) %>% 
  summarize(
    num_reviews = sum(number_of_reviews),
    rating = mean(review_overall)
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(rating))
```
